experiment.experimentTemplate module¶

Author:Dominic
class experiment.experimentTemplate.experiment(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

The abstract experiment class from which all others inherit

Many general methods for experiments are found only here

Name¶

The name of the class used when recording what has been used.

Type:string
Name = u'Empty'
feedback()[source]¶

Responds to the action from the participant

For this experiment there is no possible response

Returns:feedback
Return type:None
next()[source]¶

Produces the next stimulus for the iterator

Returns:
  • stimulus (None)
  • nextValidActions (Tuple of ints) – The list of valid actions that the model can respond with. Set to None, as they never vary.
Raises:StopIteration
outputEvolution()[source]¶

Returns all the relevent data for this experiment run

Returns:results – The dictionary contains a series of keys including Name, Observables and Actions.
Return type:dictionary
params()[source]¶

Returns the parameters of the experiment as a dictionary

Returns:parameters – The parameters of the experiment
Return type:dict
procede()[source]¶

Updates the experiment before the next trialstep

receiveAction(action)[source]¶

Receives the next action from the participant

reset()[source]¶

Creates a new experiment instance

Returns:self
Return type:The cleaned up object instance
storeState()[source]¶

Stores the state of all the important variables so that they can be output later
